    • readShowtime

      public static Map<Map<String,ArrayList<String>>,Map<String,Map<Showtime,Seat[]>>> readShowtime(String movieTitle)
      Reads the showtime database, considers only specific movie titles
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - A String representing the movie title to be considered
      Returns:
      A HashMap that contains, a HashMap that contains Cineplex ID String to Cinema ID String pairs, to a Hashmap that contains, a Cinema ID String, to a Hashmap that contains a Showtime object to Seat object array pairs pairs pairs
      See Also:
      • Showtime
